recipe_name: Braised cabbage with Shetland black potatoes
author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the potato and cook for six minutes, until golden and soft. Add the savoy cabbage and thyme sprigs and saut√© for a further four minutes. Add the coriander and lemon juice and stir in gently. To serve, place in a large bowl.
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil,  2 Shetland potatoes, chopped into 1cm cubes,  200g/7oz savoy cabbage, shredded,  3 sprigs fresh thyme,  handful fresh coriander,  1 lemon, juice only
